full_summary:
=================
### Highway Tractor and Truck Rental Services (W0113-23CS11)

**Reference Number:** WS4296536479-4345289627

**Amendment Number:** 1 (Released on 2023-12-22)

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Notice Type: Demande d’offre à commandes)

**Category:** SRV (Management, Technical and Business Services)

### Notice Details

* **[Solicitation Number:** WS4296536479](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18346583?extsite=MTgzNDY1ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-21
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-01-12 at 14:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-02-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-01-31
* **Status:** CANCELED

### Notice Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from reliable and experienced contractors to provide the rental of various highway tractors and commercial trucks on an "as requested" basis. The contractor will be responsible for providing vehicles equipped with sleeper and day cabs, including commercial highway tractors and 5-Ton Cargos and 5-Ton Reefers.

* **Location:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Driving Area:** Varies, including Canada and the United States of America
* **Duration:** Rental duration may be daily, weekly, or monthly
* **Operating Staff:** Vehicles to be driven and operated by Federal Government personnel only

**Rental Period and Options:**

The period of the standing offer will be for a base period of one year, with two optional one-year periods. The contractor will be required to maintain a fleet of highway tractors and trucks to meet the requirements of the DND.

**Requirements and Qualifications:**

The contractor must meet the minimum requirements and qualifications specified in the solicitation documents to ensure compliance with the terms and conditions of the contract.

### Contact Information

**Contract Name:** Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email:** [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
